accepts_marketing.description: Indicates whether the customer has agreed to receive marketing communications.

analytics_data.description: Data related to customer behavior and interactions within the system for analytics purposes.

billing_address1.description: First line of the customer's billing address.

billing_address2.description: Second line of the customer's billing address.

billing_city.description: City of the customer's billing address.

billing_company.description: Company name associated with the customer's billing address.

billing_country.description: Country of the customer's billing address.

billing_first_name.description: First name of the customer's billing contact.

billing_last_name.description: Last name of the customer's billing contact.

billing_phone.description: Phone number associated with the customer's billing address.

billing_province.description: Province or state of the customer's billing address.

billing_zip.description: Zip or postal code of the customer's billing address.

created_at.description: Date and time when the customer record was created.

first_charge_processed_at.description: Date and time when the customer's first charge was processed.

has_card_error_in_dunning.description: Indicates if the customer has encountered card errors in dunning processes.

has_valid_payment_method.description: Flag to denote if the customer has a valid payment method on file.

hash.description: Unique hash value associated with the customer.

number_active_subscriptions.description: Number of active subscriptions the customer currently has.

number_subscriptions.description: Total number of subscriptions the customer has purchased.

processor_type.description: Type of payment processor used by the customer.

reason_payment_method_not_valid.description: Reason provided when the payment method of the customer is considered invalid.

shopify_customer_id.description: Customer ID associated with Shopify platform.

stripe_customer_token.description: Token assigned to the customer within the Stripe payment system.

updated_at.description: Date and time when the customer record was last updated.

apply_credit_to_next_recurring_charge.description: Flag to apply any available credit towards the next recurring charge.
